html: In March 2025, I presented my AI accountability work at NICAR.
In September 2024, I was at the ONA to present my work on algorithmic accountability.
In October 2023, my profile on a gig worker union leader from India was presented at an exhibition Automated by Design in New York during the UN General Assembly.
In May 2023, I was invited to speak at the Digital Investigators Conference in Princeton University about my data collection work on gig workers in India.
During 2023, I appeared in a podcast titled Full Dashclosure to talk about my gig worker coverage in India.
In November 2022, I was invited by the Arab Reporters for Investigative Journalists for a training panel on how to report on AI and algorithms.
In April 2022, I was invited to speak at the International Journalism Festival in Perugia, Italy on AI Accountability reporting.
I have appeared on multiple BBC podcasts to speak several tech topics in India including the impact of SVB collapse and why WhatsApp was suing the Indian government.
In March 2021, I was invited to speak about my loan apps story on a Spotify podcast.
In July 2020, I spoke on Aapti Podcast about what TikTok meant to India and privacy concerns.
In July 2020, I was invited on Al Jazeera's The Stream to speak about the Indian government's TikTok ban.
